before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"42a4o","text":"The human stellate ganglia (SG) were provided by Dr. Olujimi Ajijola at UCLA. The tissue was collected post-mortem from a 44-year-old female donor and dissected immediately after the donor's death.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13b4","text":"The dissection procedure of murine SG is described in the \"Tissue Harvesting\" section of our protocol, \"Injection of cholera toxin subunit B in the interscapular brown adipose fat and Stellate Ganglion dissection.\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2cl4n","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a1dq6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":60198,"title":"Injection of cholera toxin subunit B in the interscapular brown adipose fat and Stellate Ganglion dissection","title_html":"\u003cp\u003eInjection of cholera toxin subunit B in the interscapular brown adipose fat and Stellate Ganglion dissection\u003c/p\u003e","load_collapsed":true,"uri":"injection-of-cholera-toxin-subunit-b-in-the-inters-b62ergbe","image":{"source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_source":null,"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_placeholder":null},"creator":{"name":"Daniele Neri","affiliation":null,"affiliation_url":null,"username":"daniele-neri","link":"","image":{"source":"/img/avatars/016.png","placeholder":"/img/avatars/016.png","webp_source":""}},"stats":{"number_of_steps":15},"type_id":1,"guid":"845F4560D61B11EC8F6B77FC3D899DAF"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f8mfm","text":"Both mouse and human stellate ganglia (SG) were fixed in 4% PFA in 0.1M PB overnight at 4°C, washed with Phosphate Buffer Saline (PBS) 4°C for at least 1 h","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40djq","text":"Ganglia were encased in Optimal Cutting Temperature compound (Tissue-Tek) cut into 10 μm cryo-sections on slides, and stored at -80°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8v7ct","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"76dq8","text":"Thaw the sections at room temperature for at least 1 hour","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"buf16","text":"Wash in PBS for 30 min twice at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50u34","text":"Incubate in blocking buffer (5% donkey serum in PBS with 0.1% Triton X-100) for 1 hour at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cfr65","text":"Incubate the sections with primary antibodies diluted in blocking buffer overnight at 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bahle","text":"Wash in PBS for 30 min three times at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f4ce6","text":"Incubate the sections with secondary antibodies and DAPI for 1 hour at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6qkis","text":"Wash in PBS for 30 min three times at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"etjta","text":"Mount your slides using relevant mounting media and cover slip","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Expression of molecular markers in mouse and human stellate ganglia
